participant_2.background:
I went to the beach to relax and spend time with my family.
I'm still adjusting to my new life in LA, but I'm enjoying getting to know my new neighbors and exploring the city.
i am a 43 year old woman.
my favorite number is 7.
i enjoy cooking italian food.

content.text: Hi! I am doing well, thank you for asking! How about yourself?
I am doing well too, thanks for asking! I am excited to move to LA soon!
Oh fun! I just moved here a few months ago and I am loving it so far.
That's awesome! I am looking forward to exploring the city and meeting new people.
There are so many fun things to do in LA! I have been exploring the beaches and hiking trails.
That sounds amazing! I love to go hiking and I am excited to explore the beaches.
You should check out Malibu Beach. It is one of my favorite places to go.
I will definitely check it out! Thanks for the recommendation.
No problem! I am happy to help!
I am also a big fan of Italian food. Do you have any favorite restaurants in LA?
Yes! I love going to Olive Garden. Their pasta is delicious.
I love Olive Garden too! I used to go there all the time when I was younger.
They have some of the best pasta I have ever had.
I agree! I am so excited to move to LA now!
I am sure you will love it here! There are so many great things to do and see.
